snippet: A Philadelphia woman was arrested Friday on charges she tried to join and martyr herself for the Islamic State group.
abstract: Philadelphia woman Keonna Thomas is arrested on charges she tried to join and martyr herself for the Islamic State group.
lead_paragraph: A Philadelphia woman was arrested Friday on charges she tried to join and martyr herself for the Islamic State group.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Woman Held on Terror Charge
